title: Incentives
content:
Incentives
[激励刺激]
The core of incentive-based thinking is this: to understand what someone will truly do, don’t look at their role—look at their incentives.
[激励思维这个思维模式的核心思想就是：看清一个人真正会怎么做，不是看他的职责，而是看他的激励。]
In the real world, people and organizations act not based on logic, promises, or ideals, but based on incentives.
[在真实世界里，人和组织不是按道理、按承诺、按理想行动，而是按激励行动。]
As the saying goes, "where you sit determines how you think"—what people say may differ from how they act, because action follows self-interest.
[俗话说就是屁股决定脑袋，可能口头表面上说一套，实际行动却是基于自己的利益行动。]
An incentive system is a structure that motivates people to take specific actions.
[激励机制是一套让人做出某种行为的动力系统。]
Positive incentives: What do I gain by doing this? (money, reputation, status, pleasure, a sense of accomplishment)
[正向激励：做这件事我能得到什么？（钱、声望、地位、快乐、成就感）]
Negative incentives: What do I lose if I don’t do this? (punishment, shame, elimination, anxiety)
[负向激励：不做这件事我会失去什么？（惩罚、羞耻、淘汰、焦虑）]
For example, personal behavior is rarely driven by willpower alone, but by your incentive structure.
[举个例子：在个人行为中，不是靠意志力，而是靠激励结构。]
You don’t fail to wake up early because you lack discipline, but because:
[你不是不想早起，而是：]
The immediate pleasure of staying up late outweighs the long-term benefits of waking early—your incentives reward “staying up” and punish “restraint.”
[晚睡的即时愉悦大于早起带来的长期好处，所以你的激励机制实际奖励“晚睡”，惩罚“克制”，]
To change behavior, you need to reshape your incentives—not rely solely on self-control.
[要改变行为，先调整激励结构，而不是一味靠自律。]
So how can this model improve your thinking quality?
[那如何用这个思维模式提升自己的思考质量呢？]
1. Shift your thinking from “Why is someone doing this?” to “What incentives are driving them?”
[1. 改变思考方式：从思考别人或者自己为什么这样做？转变成别人或自己做这件事受到什么激励。]
2. Optimize yourself: adjust your own incentives so that your behavior aligns with your values.
[2. 自我优化，调整自己的激励机制。通过科学合理的激励机制让自己做更符合自己价值观的事情。]
3. Analyze others, systems, or policies—identify distorted incentives. Ask, “If I were them, would I make the same choice?”
[3. 分析别人、系统、政策：找出“扭曲激励”的地方。比如换位思考：“如果我是他，我会不会做出一样的选择？”]
Understanding incentives helps you grasp how the world works:
[学习激励机制有助于了解世界的运行规律：]
Understand incentives → Understand human nature → Understand behavior → Understand the situation → Change your life
[看懂激励 → 看懂人性 → 看懂行为 → 看懂局势 → 改变人生]
